titleInfo.title: A tracing of Arabic plan showing site south of Manamah acquired by the British Government

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on tracing clothDimensions:350 x 240 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Copied in Air Headquarters, Iraq at Hinaidi.A tracing of Arabic plan relating to the deed of purchase for the plot situated about 1 Â½ miles south of Manamah on the east coast of Bahrein in the close proximity to the existing RAF Rest House. The extent of the plot shown in red with dimensions reported.
